pages.text: In order to incubate gems, first you must craft an Incubator. See the next page to find the recipe for the Incubator.

Now, place down your Incubator where ever you would like it, then you can open the Incubator GUI by right-clicking the block.$(br2)In order to create gems you need Gem Essence, Chroma, an inactive Gem base of your choosing, plus the cruxes required to grow that gem.
Each gem has a page in the guidebook that describes what its requirements are, including cruxes and Gem Essence colors.

You may also supplement the Incubator with additional items to aid in incubation, such as a Prime Booster or a Speed Booster. Please view the following pages to find the example image of how the Incubator should be used.
When the Incubator is in use, please remember to fill ALL crux slots with material. It can be a mixture of a gem's preferred cruxes or just one type only, but ALL slots must be filled.
